activities.description: Practice listening to an IELTS audio clip and answer related questions.
Read a passage from an IELTS study material and summarize its main points.
Record yourself discussing a familiar topic in English.
Write a short response for Task 1 IELTS Writing.
Practice listening to another IELTS audio clip and answer questions.
Read a different passage and summarize it using your own words.
Practice answering IELTS Speaking questions out loud.
Write a response for Task 2 IELTS Writing (Opinion essay).
Listen to an IELTS lecture or talk and take notes.
Read an academic article or passage and answer comprehension questions.
Discuss a random topic with a friend or family member in English.
Review your written essays and identify areas for improvement.
Listen to a conversation and take notes to summarize the main points.
Read a passage from a different source and answer related questions.
Record yourself discussing a complex topic in English.
Write a response for a different type of Task 1 (e.g., diagram, process).
Practice a mock IELTS Speaking test with a timer.
Listen to an IELTS podcast episode and summarize the content.
Read a sample IELTS passage and answer questions under timed conditions.
Review grammar and vocabulary resources to enhance your writing skills.
Record a full-length mock IELTS Speaking test.
